## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it address?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Note
Please remember this is the **open-source version** that supports Python and Text modes only. Feature requests for additional language support should note that those features are part of the commercial version.
